website_summaries.verdict: There’s no measuring or pouring needed with these convenient pods, and their fresh smell and no-stress, no-mess nature makes them a winner.
pros: This detergent does an impressive job softening fabric and brightening whites and colors
Pods are accompanied by the citrusy and amber scent of Gain that many love
Available in a tub of 81 pods, these don’t leave a soapy residue on clothing
cons: Childproof packaging can be tough for even adults to open

customer_reviews.title: Stick a few in a plastic travel soapbox to take on vacation too
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Gain and the detergent works just great for me. I really like these little flings, they are such a handy little convenience. I'm disabled, its hard for me to stand for long so I really appreciate being able to just grab one of these little pods and drop it into the washer. It's a big improvement over taking down a heavy bottle of detergent, taking the top off, measuring the liquid, etc. It weighs a lot less than a bottle of detergent. I really wish these had been around when I was a young mother and didn't have my own washer/dryer. It would have been so much easier than lugging detergent to the Laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dub

customer_reviews.title: I subscribe to these; cant beat the price or the convenience
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and goes a long way (surprisingly enough). It says to use 1 POD for small loads, 2 pods for medium, etc. Any time I use 2 POD I seem to have a residue (soapy feeling) on the clothes. One POD seems to get clothes nice and clean (I have 2 littles and a messy husband), and if I feel like I need a little extra cleaning power for the kids stuff I'll add a sprinkle of Arm and Hammer Washing Soda/Booster. I only use 2 pods for extra large loads of the adult's clothes or super dirty stuff. I'm using a newer Samsung front load washer (their entry level)
customer_reviews.author: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Pods By Gain Smell great & Do A Great Job
customer_reviews.text: I love the pods. They work great in my washer & Gain smells great. I also put a pod of fabric softener in when I start up the machine. Gain really does a good job of cleaning even all the doggy towels that I use for grooming and on my rescues. The laundry smells so clean using Gain. I love Amazons delivery and not having to worry about forgetting to pick it up. I have ordered every few months so I never give out. These dissolve and clean even if I use cold water. I also like how they are stored and are packaged safe.
customer_reviews.author: dswpoodles

customer_reviews.title: Gets clothes clean, smells fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love Gain scented products, the Bounce sheets, crystals and of course these pods. They are available in a wide variety of sizes with the 35 count being my favorite. What can you say they gets clothes clean, smells fresh and clean and scent lasts for days. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dissolve with bed sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to rate poorly. These simply do not dissolve. I have brand new LG washing machines and have had very bad luck getting these to dissolve even in hot water and extended washes. For clothes, this product works. For sheets, the film wedges itself into the sheet bundles and doesn't wash out. It's very frustrating to wash sheets twice in hot water!
customer_reviews.author: KeepItClassy

customer_reviews.title: Good price, effective laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love these and the price of this 81-pack. I've read some reviews of people using multiple flings per wash--and it's mentioned in the instructions for large loads--but I always just get by with 1 per wash. I've never noticed any issues with 1 fling getting my clothes clean, and the scent is great. The Febreze seems to help with any lingering odors in things like reused bath towels. All in all, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Travieso310

customer_reviews.title: These smell really fragrant but they don't always melt completely ...
customer_reviews.text: These smell really fragrant but they don't always melt completely so the plastic pouch gets stuck to my clothes. I have had this happen a handful of times and I still have about a third left. I actually started putting them in my detergent tray to hopefully prevent the stickiness because I keep having to rewash my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: The lid
customer_reviews.text: As much as I like this product, as I’ve used the powder for years but switched to the pods...I really wish you could devise a different lid for the container. My hands aren’t wide enough to stretch across the top to the tabs and then push them in and turn all at one time. I continually have to take it to someone else in the household and get them to open it. One day someone won’t be here when I need it opened and if I have to take a knife to it, it won’t be a pretty scene afterwards.😊
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT DISSOLVE IN FRONT-LOAD WASHERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you own a front-load washer, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Even using hot water, these pods do not fully dissolve. Your clothes will be gummed-up and stuck together! It's a HUGE mess. It reminds me of clear acrylic caulk cementing your clothes together. Sometimes takes 2 additional wash cycles to remove!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Packet Doesn't Disolve Completely.
customer_reviews.text: The capsule packaging does not totally dissolve and will stick to your clothes after the wash; or if you don't see this, it will go through the dryer and harden up. I have a front-loading washer and the detergent packet is added to the wash BEFORE the laundry; and I have used hot, warm and cold water. Still the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Gain for laundry not lunch
customer_reviews.text: Laundry pods are my favorite - less mess, no missing plastic cup at the washing machine, no drips from a giant jug of detergent on the floor. Gain is my favorite scent. Combine the two and it's ideal. The bag is nice for less waste. I have had no issues with the pods sticking together - a cheaper brand I tried of these ended up being useless because the pods connected. The price here at Amazon is similar to my grocery store when not on sale so the convenience was worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian PaulaTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convenient option comparable to Tide Pods, requires more pods per load than others
customer_reviews.text: These are a more expensive yet convenient option for those looking for the great, fresh scent of Gain with the convenience and simplicity of pods. The only real thing to note when comparing these to Tide Pods and other brands is that they require 1-3 pods per load depending on the size. Other brands typically use 1-2 pods per load but don't have as strong of a scent. The scent stays on the clothes and is very noticeable compared to other brands which seem to disappear after drying. I still prefer to use the Gain liquid detergent to save money.
customer_reviews.author: WDW

customer_reviews.title: That fresh smell is not a myth!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Tide, though I have tried many brands. I saw a commercial one day about the lasting freshness of this detergent, and I decided to give it a try. Not only do the clothes have a refreshing scent that stays, the house actually smells better when we wash out laundry with this detergent. It also cleans just as well as our old brand. We are hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Silla

customer_reviews.title: Gain flings! Liquid Laundry Detergent Pacs, Original, 81 Count
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I have not had any of the problems with these that I have read about in the reviews & have been buying these now for 6 months & I use 1 tub a month because I wash a load of cloths everyday because the kids get dirty very dirty from playing in the dirt, snow & mud everyday just as they should be doing & every stain is removed every time and the scent is amazing & here the price is truly mind blowing my Local Walmart sells these for $21.81 for a tub of 72, & here $16.99 for 81..Thanks for such an awesome deal
customer_reviews.author: Brian.

customer_reviews.title: Very slimy in bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time but usually buy from local store. Decided to try delivery....there was so much moisture in the bag. Every time I go to grab one I feel like I’m putting my hand in slimy soap. I won’t purchase online again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for the first time and was please with the scent, cleanliness of the clothing washed, and ease of use. One caution is make sure your hands are dry when handing the pods as the outer shell melts quickly when contacted with water. This occurred when handling wet towels and then touching a pod. Unless a better product is introduced, I will probably remain with this product for the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Sachse TX

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It, Hard to Find In Stores
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone else have family members who use like 5 of these for one load thinking they need that much soap? Well, that's my household. I love buying these pods because they're bigger and I think psychologically, everyone doesn't feel the need to grab a handful for the wash. If you do the calculations, you really can't beat the price either. It's easy and arrives really quickly so I don't have to worry about looking for it on sale and going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Nong

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: i actually prefer the powder, I find that the laundry powder's scent stays around longer + theres minimal plastic (cardboard box & plastic scooper) but now that i live in new york and have to do my laundry at a laundromat, cant beat the convenience of the pods
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Nothing smells better!
customer_reviews.text: I Gain is hands down the best laundry soap that I have ever used to date. Nothing makes my clothes smell better or gets them cleaner. I love that the scent is not just there after the clothes have been freshly washed, but it stays and lingers on the clothes for days while they hang in the closet. I always feel so clean and fresh putting on my clothes that have been washed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It has the great scent of original gain detergent with the bonus of having the fabric softener as well so the days of using something like the Downy ball or adding fabric softener later in the cycle (for those of us with older washers) are over. I use 1 for a light or medium load, and 2 for a heavy load. And, as a perk, they are available as subscribe and save items so you can have them auto-delivered on whatever schedule fits best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: A Plus
customer_reviews.text: I was using Tide Scent Free and the product wasn't quite doing the job. Some of the clothes and wash towels didn't come out smelling clean, etc. So now, I use a pack of the Tide Scent Free and a pack of the Gain Flings! and the laundry comes out clean and smelling fresh. You can feel and smell the difference. Since I have four big dogs, this really helps with their bedding, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Gets funky smells out of laundry and makes everything smell wonderful
customer_reviews.text: After years of using liquid detergent’s that get to bubbly in the machine it’s so nice to have a pre-measured amount of detergent not to mention the fact that this makes your clothing smell wonderful even rank gym clothes and musty towels! It gets all the smells out and I love that the oxy clean Is already in there
customer_reviews.author: raffaella

customer_reviews.title: Love that scent
customer_reviews.text: Gain has always been one of my favorite detergent. I only use the original. I love the lasting scent and it gets your clothes clean. A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I really like how my clothes smell after using Gain Flings. My clothes smell fresh all day and they look clean as well. I love how easy the pods are. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that near the bottom of the container, one of the pods had burst. It was a little sticky getting the rest of the pods out but at least I love the fragrance :-).
customer_reviews.author: Sage Farm Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I started developing sensitive skin a few years back and several laundry detergents make me develop pretty bad rashes. This is the first I've found since this started that smells amazing and causes zero reaction to my skin. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, great cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I found these much better quality and after-wash scent of clothes than the Tide tablets. I'm really satisfied and will probably purchase again. The box also has a much better seal than the Tide one which brakes easily. I would greatly recommend. What is more, as directed in the box use two tablets for larger loads. It will give your clothes such a pleasant smell.. it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Aristidou

customer_reviews.title: Classic scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this classic Gain scent. Pods are easy to use, and do a good job getting clothes clean and smelling good. I usually only use one pod unless the load is really huge or especially stinky. Pair it with the Gain dryer sheets if you want even more scent heaven.
customer_reviews.author: JoeGriff

customer_reviews.title: May have gotten a bad batch.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I love Gain, but I hate these ... maybe I got a bad batch ... 1. they were discolored; I have purchased from another retailer before (in the big tub of flings) and those were a bright green and sparkling white, THESE were dark dark green and a yellowish white. Makes me think they were old stock, which may be why: 2. they did not dissolve despite what P & G replied to other comments of the same ... this package did NOT dissolve when product was used correctly. 3. would not buy these again. Will stick with powdered Gain.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Gain vs others
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kept secret to washerwoman and men. My mother was a Tide woman and boy did I experience incredible events when I switched over!! Clothes smell cleaner for longer, stains come out easier (even the stains that you forgot), and price comparison, well you can save money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Love these Love the Smell
customer_reviews.text: These truly are amazing easy to use they lasted me for 35 Days using 1 pod pack for each load I wash a load of cloths everyday living in a house 6 it's necessary to keep cloths from piling up all loads where medium will buy more & more every month will buy + Much Cheaper than my local store
customer_reviews.author: Brian.

customer_reviews.title: A+ Detergent
customer_reviews.text: These little pods are actually great. I always thought they wouldn't get the job done because they're pods, but they work perfectly. You only need 1 for the load (or 2 if it's a lot). It washes everything completely and it leaves my clothes smelling great. The plastic from the pod disappears so you don't have to worry about bits of plastic being in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for the cloths
customer_reviews.text: I was a sales associate for a major department store. When I sold a new washer I always recommended this product. Front load washers are made to be efficient and use much less water. Pods are ideal for them. This is what I use.
customer_reviews.author: John Caporicci

customer_reviews.title: It shoul stay the same name
customer_reviews.text: I love it very much.. but I live in a town house an I think when I was washing it clogged the other person sink .. they knocked on the door an told me all he smelled was GAIN PODS LIKE SOMEONE IS SMELLING LIKE SOMEONE IS WASHING CLOTHES.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Yuck! Musty sweet fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I am not in liking this. It makes the clothes smell musty sweet. We have a front load HD washer and I clean it regularly. Regular liquid soap works well, these pouches make the clothes stinky. Not a fan. . .
customer_reviews.author: oh*mommyme

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use every time
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Clothes came out smelling great and super clean ! Would recommend for anyone like me who goes to a laundry matt super safe to carry in the trunk all the time than liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Easy and mess free
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent. I like pod cause it’s mess free. Just have to be careful I do not break it before I put in washer. One time, I left a pod on top of wet towel in hamper. By the time I tried to put all laundry and this pod, the pod skin was already started to melt and I barely made broken pod in washer.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great cleaning! The container is a little hard for me to get into...so I used a flathead screwdriver to pop the top off. Worked great and closed back okay. 😃 Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: So easy.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these frequently now because it is much easier and they work great with my front loader. No more measuring or estimating how much I need to use one for small to medium loads and two for larger loads like comforters or a lot of bed sheets this is awesome I love them.
customer_reviews.author: LizTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... I have recently switched to these as they are amazing. Before we would use the liquid Gain and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have recently switched to these as they are amazing. Before we would use the liquid Gain and Snuggle as a fabric softener. Now we just toss one or two in and out clothes smell better than the method we were using before. I also love how my house is filled with the smell of laundry detergent on laundry day.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Less mess, great for kids doing laundry
customer_reviews.text: We use the Gain Pods all if the time now. My kids have done their own laundry for a while and measuring the detergent plus keeping the area clean of spills has been a headache. These are great! Also, This is a great value. It was several dollars less than Walmart and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: These pods don’t always melt and stick to the clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Love how handy it is to just throw a pod in the washer BUT if you’re not careful, and don’t place them directly under the water stream. The plastic doesn’t always discenegrate and sticks to your clothes. So you have to rewash the item.
customer_reviews.author: stinger2133

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth it! One stop laundry
customer_reviews.text: Stayed with a friend for a few days and they only had these. I was thinking "no fabric softener? No bleach? Just these pods?" Then I used them and I am hooked. It's worth the money because it's the only thing you need.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: Its soap so it works well but after a time in the laundry room the packets stick together and you have to take some time to separate them and they do break so do it over the Machine.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to liquid detergent!
customer_reviews.text: Pods are so much better than liquid detergent. They clean well (I can't speak for stains), and I smell good literally all day, something that never happened with liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Rumzie D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love Gain for my laundry detergent, so I decided to try the Detergent pacs. They work well, but I have gone back to the liquid because my washer has a liquid detergent dispenser. I like having more control over how much detergent to use in each load.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Budget-friendly laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Gain Flings are so easy to use. No more dripping detergent bottles. I just throw one of the pacs in the washer and they do their magic. There is never a residual pod in the washer when it finishes spinning and the clothes have been coming out perfectly clean and smelling great. Gain is my new budget-friendly laundry detergent!
customer_reviews.author: J.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Get your Gain fling on!
customer_reviews.text: Such a convenient laundry product! I ADORE the smell of Gain products & always have to have a reserve supply on standby. My clothes always come out clean & Gain fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the heavy duty plastic and would like a more eco option, but the bag options I have had come leaking and a huge mess. Pleasant scent and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, clean clothes, great on stains
customer_reviews.text: Have been a decades long Tide user. I still like Tide but wanted to try something new. Love the scent, clothes smell clean long after washing, removes stains well. Recommended. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Clothes  does not look or smell fresh after it
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the scent.It smells like spray for the restroom.The clothes does not look or smell fresh after it.Next time I will buy only a scent free detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia I.

customer_reviews.title: What a mess
customer_reviews.text: Before I even got half way through all the pods had melted together I have to tear apart It’s so messy Liquid soap goes everywhere This has never happened before So frustrating
customer_reviews.author: marsha johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love GAIN pods
customer_reviews.text: Have been using GAIN pods for about a year and love them. PROS Small, pre-measured pods - so easy - toss into your washer and start the cycle Cleans remarkably well - no need for additional whiteners for normal laundering Clothes are nice and soft straight out of the dryer - no need for dryer sheets Laundry smells heavenly - love love love the smell of GAIN Pod fully dissolves and has never clogged my washer or left any kind of residue CONS none for me :-)
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've been using Gain Flings for a few years and am quite pleased with them. They are highly effective cleaning agents and the aroma is delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I had bought an organic type of laundry detergent, and it just was not doing it for my laundry. I missed the smell and clear cleanliness that my old detergent brought. This took care of it!
customer_reviews.author: Rae-Ann

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to always buy Gain and have just fallen in love with the pods. Just so much easier than the powders and liquids. Love this container too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debster

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It has a light, clean smell. I've never had a problem with them melting on my clothes, or sticking to the drum. But if anyone else has, I would recommend putting in the pod FIRST before you put in your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Amazing scent!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best.. will never go back to regular laundry detergent. So much easier/cost effective when washing a ton of clothes for a house with 2 kids and pets!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent of the laundry using the Gain flings
customer_reviews.text: Teens can do the laundry because I don't have to worry about them spilling the laundry soap, using too much or too little. Gain has such a nice scent. It is wonderful to slip into a freshly laundered shirt washed in the Gain laundry fling.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Mess -Subscribe & Save :)
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of gain! Recently switched to “pods” for the ease of just tossing a couple into the washer without spilling messy liquid or powder all over the place! The price is great compared to brick and mortar stores - especially if you “subscribe and save.”
customer_reviews.author: PeaceLuv&Light

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love using the Gain packs. They are more cost efficient than any of the other name brands and give the same results. It’s also nice to have them delivered right to your door.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to the Smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the other brand for over 25 years and I just changed to all GAIN products for my laundry needs and I believe this stuff smells better and smells stronger than the other brands. I am definitely a new customer to GAIN and I like the great new smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Strietelmeier

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I will never use liquid, powder, or scent booster ever again. I have this hooked up to a Dash button for easy ordering. No other laundry detergent will ever have a smell as amazing as original Gain. This one also has some built in scent boosters. My home is grateful for this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle Épée

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love getting a great deal on these Flings! I put them in my washer with the scent beads and let them spin a bit before I put my laundry in there.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like "sweet" smelling laundry detergent. I have found that Tide is too sweet. This is a muskier, more outdoorsy smell, and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and easy to use! I don't like that they've changed the top of the packaging to be "child-proof," it's a little harder to get into than I'd like. But overall a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Gets clothes clean
customer_reviews.text: Gain not only smells good, but gets my clothes clean on the first try. I used this for my work clothes when I worked with dogs and it kept my work clothes looking and smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: Value and scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of gain and this purchase was a great value in my opinion. It seems it dulls my clothes with bright color though
customer_reviews.author: Insert Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Gain is a GAIN
customer_reviews.text: I tried different brands (dont want to name them here) but this once is really good and clothes smells good even after hours of washing and drying.
customer_reviews.author: TheifGold

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Cheaper on here than in stores. I hate buying them because of the price! I wish I had discount codes. I would buy more often if it were cheaper! #momonabudget
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The way it leaves my clothes so fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to do my laundry because I love the fresh scent and the way it leaves my clothes so fresh for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and cleans as good/better than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t I give 7 or 10 or 15 stars for the scent? Very nice. Strangely soothing. Cleans better than others and the packet dissolves completely.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe (Kurt) Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: These have the best scent to them and it’s the lingering scent that when you open a drawer u can smell the scent . Love them also they clean the clothes clean
customer_reviews.author: Cedric barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something natural, but I just love the gain scent! These are super convenient and easy to just pop in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Emme D.

customer_reviews.title: Fling it in !
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, just Fling it in. Smells great like all gain products. I really only use these with blankets and towels because I like the scent.
customer_reviews.author: trishh12

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this was an outlier or what!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stuck to each other and trying to separate meant the tote apart. Needless to say I would end up with two, three or four stuck together and had to use all those coz separating them tore them apart. Do I ended up not saving anything. I’m back to the regular powder I use which I’ve never bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: PO

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: love this item would recommend to anyone to get and I would buy again it is as shown in photo
customer_reviews.author: Racquel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Original Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Really like Gain Flings. Cleaning power & the original scent is the best. All scents are awesome but can't to original. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reesa's Mom

customer_reviews.title: For large washers only
customer_reviews.text: These pods are very large for large washers. They did the job on my regular/medium sized washer but just tooo much detergent and started to add an additional rinse cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: PODS
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it makes your clothes smell if after weeks of washing them. They still smell fresh just like we I just washed them today. I like that in these pods that I use. Thank You. LH
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Smelling Gain Pods, no measure, no hassle. Save an extra 5% when you add to subscription
customer_reviews.text: When you don't have time to measure, just toss in 2 of these Gain Fresh Scent detergent pods. Also save an extra 5% when you add to a subscription
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gurule

customer_reviews.title: I have the best smelling closet!
customer_reviews.text: I love Gain as silly as commercials are for gain they actually are right on. Pleasurable scent and last weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Packet stains on clothes if cold water used only
customer_reviews.text: Use warm water. Never use cold water only packet won’t desolve
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while on sale to give them a try, and I think I may use these as my go-to laundry detergent now. They clean better than my cheap detergent, and also smell great. The pacs make it convenient to just throw some in rather than measuring liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Elbers

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work good. Smells nice. Once in a very long while they tend to not dissolve all of the way and I find residue on some clothes. I just re-wash them. Other than that I enjoy using them
customer_reviews.author: sarah heimo

customer_reviews.title: Still a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but I'm a person that I very big on fragrance, this doesn't really have that.
customer_reviews.author: Sherika  Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Gain?
customer_reviews.text: Don't even need dryer sheets for these. They smell and feel clean straight out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Gain Flings work very well, smell great, and are so easy to use. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not an acceptable packaging of product
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be on the market! The cover is very difficult to remove. I had to use a knife. I removed a few pods to a smaller container. They stuck together and I could not separate them without breaking them. The solution and broken Plastic mixed together. Just a real mess. Ended up dumping all 5 pods in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 scent.
customer_reviews.text: Best detergent every. I've used it for over 7 years now. No complaints ever. My clothes feel fresh clean and smell gr8.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana D Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Gain
customer_reviews.text: Just got my pods and over half we’re broken. Big mess. Maybe add more bubble wraps. I will buy again. Joan. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use Gain Pods
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of the Gain Pod. It is so easy to use. You just drop it in and start your wash.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Young

customer_reviews.title: Gain Flings
customer_reviews.text: I love Gain flings. I ordered these online because it is hard for me to walk through stores due to health reasons. Great buy,
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cuthbertson

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: My new FAV! Aroma booster is the only way to go! Awesome scent, smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great,low price
customer_reviews.text: Everything is going to be great with this product.grrat and cleans great too.
customer_reviews.author: BettyMc Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Great scents, and I love the added bonus of softener built right into the pod, just toss them into the wash load and out comes freshly scently softer clothes it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Rotondo

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Pods are easy to use. These have a good scent and clean clothes well
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, but pods leaked during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. It is my favorite. Not sure if I will have to stop ordering though as this container had multiple pods leak. It is a sticky mess inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alena McGahern

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It gets all my husbands dirty clothes as well as my hand wash items. Smells clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Haak

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worth buying, but if the price can be cheaper, it will be fine!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: A must have in your laundry room
customer_reviews.text: I love the flings so easy to use. They get my clothes clean leaving a wonderful scent.
customer_reviews.author: icy

product_meta.title: Gain flings! Liquid Laundry Detergent Pacs, Original, 81 Count
product_meta.description: Style:FlingsGain flings! Laundry detergent pacs in Original Scent. Detergent plus Oxi and Febreze, three big things in one fling!
feature_bullets: Gain Flings and Tide Pods are America’s favorite laundry pacs.
2x the cleaning ingredients vs Gain Original Scent liquid laundry detergent.
6 weeks of freshness from wash until wear.
50% more scent than Gain powder laundry detergent.
Regular and HE Washer compatible. Dissolves in hot and cold water.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
